long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Patent Suite
   (1) Claims analyser
         ★ simple interface to record claims
         ★ identify independent/dependent/appended claims
         ★ claims tree for easy identification of claim dependencies
         ★ show: all, only independent or only dependent claims
         ★ tidy claims
         ★ antecedent checker
         ★ unity checker
         ★ claim error indicator
   (2) Specification generator - html output
   (3) Search Information Statement (SIS) generator
   (4) Prior Art organiser
         ★ collect, sort, view prior art documents
   (5) Search interface
         ★ Common interface for various search engines: 
                       Google Patents, Espacenet, AusPat, The Lens, FPO
         ★ Abstract, Full Text, Claims, IPC, CPC, Inventors, Applicants, 
             Date range: Publication/Priority/Filing
   (6) Log
         ★ Log all Patent searches conducted & viewed in the various search engines
